object_name.value: Validate selected document is not involved in an active workflow including periodic and withdrawal WF

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution

"$value(object_name)" is already involved in an active workflow. Before performing this action, you should allow the currently active workflow to complete or you should stop the currently active workflow.

dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where exists (select r_object_id from dmi_package p,dm_workflow w where p.r_workflow_id = w.r_object_id and any p.r_component_id in (select r_object_id from dm_sysobject(all) where i_chronicle_id= '$value(i_chronicle_id)') and (w.r_runtime_state = 1 or w.r_runtime_state= 3))
